name: MLCLSTMDescriptor
desc: The configuration object you use to create the LSTM layer.

items.name: init(inputSize: Int, hiddenSize: Int, layerCount: Int)
items.desc: Creates a batch first LSTM descriptor with the input size and number of layers you specify.

items.name: init(inputSize: Int, hiddenSize: Int, layerCount: Int, usesBiases: Bool, isBidirectional: Bool, dropout: Float)
items.desc: Creates a batch first LSTM descriptor with bias and bidirectional options you specify.

items.name: init(inputSize: Int, hiddenSize: Int, layerCount: Int, usesBiases: Bool, batchFirst: Bool, isBidirectional: Bool, dropout: Float)
items.desc: Creates a batch first LSTM descriptor that allows you to indicate whether the input and output shape is batch first.

items.name: init(inputSize: Int, hiddenSize: Int, layerCount: Int, usesBiases: Bool, batchFirst: Bool, isBidirectional: Bool, returnsSequences: Bool, dropout: Float)
items.desc: Creates a batch first LSTM descriptor that allows you to indicate whether the layer returns output for all sequences, or output for only the last sequence.

items.name: init(inputSize: Int, hiddenSize: Int, layerCount: Int, usesBiases: Bool, batchFirst: Bool, isBidirectional: Bool, returnsSequences: Bool, dropout: Float, resultMode: MLCLSTMResultMode)
items.desc: Creates a descriptor with the number of features and layers, dropout, and options for use of biases, batch order, return sequences, bidirectionality, and expected tensors you specify.

items.name: var batchFirst: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the input and output shape is batch first.

items.name: var hiddenSize: Int
items.desc: The number of features in the hidden state.

items.name: var inputSize: Int
items.desc: The number of expected features in the input.

items.name: var isBidirectional: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the layer is bidirectional.

items.name: var resultMode: MLCLSTMResultMode
items.desc: The mode that indicates whether the layer produces a single result tensor or three result tensors â€” final output, last hidden state, and the cell state.

items.name: var returnsSequences: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the layer returns output for all sequences.

items.name: var usesBiases: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether you use bias weights.
